Flow.description: Screen Flow that allows user to select Clone (Basic) or Clone (Next Year) to clone the event. 8/22/25 - Added Attendee Survey and Sponsor Survey checkboxes to both routes. 3/24/25 - Added Standardized Event Name to Clone (Next Year) route. 7/26/24 - Added Event History Count & Event History Type fields.
Flow.interviewLabel: Event or Conference - SF - Clone Event {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Event or Conference - SF - Clone Event

validationRule.errorMessage: Oops! The Event Name can be up to 80 characters long and cannot contain commas.
Oops! The Event Nickname can be up to 80 characters long.

fields.name: Basic_Screen_Event_History_Type
fields.helpText: [Annual = Consecutive]: Event was held each year without interruption. [Historical = Non-Consecutive]: There were one or more gaps of at least one year between dates the event was held.

fields.name: Basic_Screen_Event_History_Count
fields.helpText: The number of times the event has been held, including this year.

validationRule.errorMessage: Oops! The Event Name can be up to 80 characters long and cannot contain commas.
Oops! Please enter a maximum of 255 characters, including spaces.
Oops! The Nickname can be up to 80 characters long.

fields.name: Next_Year_Screen_Event_History_Type
fields.helpText: [Annual = Consecutive]: Event was held each year without interruption. [Historical = Non-Consecutive]: There were one or more gaps of at least one year between dates the event was held.

fields.name: Next_Year_Screen_Event_History_Count
fields.helpText: The number of times the event has been held, including this year.

fields.name: Display_Success_Message
fields.fieldText:
Success! {!Get_Current_Event_or_Conference.Name} has been cloned:

{!var_Event_Record.Name}
